item.title: META
item.description: score:39 Chances: Meta Platforms continues to expand its offerings, including AI and the metaverse, which presents significant growth opportunities for the company. The company’s Family of Apps segment, which includes Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp, is a major source of revenue and user engagement.
